parameters.name: AlarmUniqueInfo
parameters.description:
The ID of the alert event.

> To query the details of an alert event, you must specify the ID of the alert event. You can call the [DescribeSuspEvents](~~DescribeSuspEvents~~) operation to query the IDs of alert events.

parameters.name: AssetsTypeList
parameters.description: The types of the assets.

parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the cluster of whose alert events you want to query.

parameters.name: ContainerFieldName
parameters.description:
The key of the condition that is used to query alert events on containers. Valid values:

*   **instanceId**: the ID of the asset
*   **appName**: the name of the application
*   **clusterId**: the ID of the cluster
*   **regionId**: the ID of the region
*   **nodeName**: the name of the node
*   **namespace**: the namespace
*   **clusterName**: the name of the cluster
*   **image**: the name of the image
*   **imageRepoName**: the name of the image repository
*   **imageRepoNamespace**: the namespace to which the image repository belongs
*   **imageRepoTag**: the tag that is added to the image
*   **imageDigest**: the digest of the image

parameters.name: ContainerFieldValue
parameters.description: The value of the condition that is used to query alert events on containers.

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: Dealed
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the alert event is handled. Valid values:

*   **N**: unhandled
*   **Y**: handled

parameters.name: EventNames
parameters.description: The subtype of the alert event. Separate multiple subtypes with commas (,).

parameters.name: From
parameters.description: The data source of the alert event. Set the value to sas.

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the asset group to which the affected asset belongs.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The ID of the alert event.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: Levels
parameters.description:
The severity of the alert event. Separate multiple severities with commas (,). Valid values:

*   **serious**
*   **suspicious**
*   **remind**

parameters.name: MultiAccountActionType
parameters.description:
The type of the accounts that you want to query. Default value: **0**. Valid values:

*   **0**: the current account.
*   **1**: all accounts.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the asset that is affected by the alert event.

parameters.name: OperateErrorCodeList
parameters.description: An array that consists of the handling result codes of alert events.

parameters.name: OperateTimeEnd
parameters.description: The timestamp when the handling operation ends.

parameters.name: OperateTimeStart
parameters.description: The timestamp when the handling operation starts.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: **20**. Maximum value: 100.

parameters.name: ParentEventTypes
parameters.description:
The alert type of the alert event. Valid values:

*   **Suspicious process**
*   **Webshell**
*   **Unusual logon**
*   **Exception**
*   **Sensitive file tampering**
*   **Malicious process (cloud threat detection)**
*   **Suspicious network connection**
*   **Suspicious account**
*   **Application intrusion event**
*   **Cloud threat detection**
*   **Precise defense**
*   **Application whitelist**
*   **Persistent webshell**
*   **Web application threat detection**
*   **Malicious script**
*   **Threat intelligence**
*   **Malicious network activity**
*   **Cluster exception**
*   **Webshell (on-premises threat detection)**
*   **Vulnerability exploitation**
*   **Malicious process (on-premises threat detection)**
*   **Trusted exception**
*   **Others**

parameters.name: Remark
parameters.description:
The name of the alert or the information about the asset.

>  Fuzzy search is supported. The asset information includes the name, public IP address, and private IP address of an asset.

parameters.name: ResourceDirectoryAccountId
parameters.description:
The Alibaba Cloud account ID of the member in the resource directory.

>  You can call the [DescribeMonitorAccounts](~~DescribeMonitorAccounts~~) operation to query the ID.

parameters.name: SortColumn
parameters.description:
The custom sorting field. Default value: **operateTime**. Valid values:

*   **lastTime**: the latest occurrence time.
*   **operateTime**: the handling time.

>  This parameter takes effect if you set the **Dealed** parameter to Y.

parameters.name: SortType
parameters.description:
The custom sorting order. Default value: **desc**. Valid values:

*   **asc**: the ascending order
*   **desc**: the descending order

>  This parameter takes effect if you set the **Dealed** parameter to Y.

parameters.name: Source
parameters.description: The source of the alert.

parameters.name: SourceAliUids
parameters.description: The IDs of the Alibaba Cloud accounts within which alerts are generated.

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: The source IP address of the request.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the alert event. Valid values:

*   **0**: all
*   **1**: pending handling
*   **2**: ignored
*   **4**: confirmed
*   **8**: marked as a false positive
*   **16**: handling
*   **32**: handled
*   **64**: expired
*   **128**: deleted
*   **512**: automatically blocking
*   **513**: automatically blocked

parameters.name: StrictMode
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the strict alerting mode.

*   N: no
*   Y: Yes

parameters.name: SupportOperateCodeList
parameters.description: 告警支持的操作类型列表。

parameters.name: TacticId
parameters.description: The tactic ID of ATT\&CK.

parameters.name: TargetType
parameters.description:
The item that is used to search for the container. Valid values:

*   **containerId**: the ID of the container
*   **uuid**: the UUID of the server
*   **imageUuid**: the UUID of the image

parameters.name: TimeEnd
parameters.description: The end time when the alert event was last detected.

parameters.name: TimeStart
parameters.description: The start time when the alert event was last detected.

parameters.name: UniqueInfo
parameters.description: The unique key of the alert.

parameters.name: Uuids
parameters.description: The UUID of the server on which the alert is detected. Separate multiple UUIDs with commas (,).
